data.title: Lottie Williams-Burrell
data.meta_description: Lottie Williams-Burrell is on ktspeechwork.org. Join ktspeechwork.org to view Lottie Williams-Burrell\'s profile
data.text:
Lottie (she/her) is Joint Head of Voice at Mountview, London, where she teaches speech, accent/dialect and voice to students on the BA and MA programs. Lottie holds an MA in Professional Voice Practice from the Royal Birmingham Conservatoire, a BA (hons) in Acting and a CELTA qualification for teaching English as a foreign language.

Lottie works as a dialect coach for theatre and her credits include Betrayal, Harold Pinter Theatre and Broadway; Grease, Leicester Curve; Indecent Proposal and The Sorcerer's Apprentice, Southwark Playhouse; Mushy: Lyrically Speaking, Watford Palace Theatre and the Wanamaker Festival, Shakespeare's Globe. She is a proud member of VASTA (Voice and Speech Trainers Association).
